overview: Lipi fell for Koni the day she saw her for the first time, trying to get a perfect picture of an idol in the workshop where Lipi worked. It was beautiful, unadulterated. Discover a 'forbidden', but not so forbidden love in the beautiful lanes and by-lanes of Kumartuli in Kolkata. Let us also ask each other as we sing, "Have You?"
tagline: A forbidden tale of love through music between two women in the bylanes of Kolkata.
title: Have You
